1.title: Billionaire Playgrounds
1.plot: Get a look at glamorous private sanctuaries and getaways of the billionaires.

2.title: Mega Toys
2.plot: Prepare to be awestruck as Forbes Luxe 11 reveals the world's most extravagant perks, personal hideaways, and divine diversions. These billionaire-funded follies go way beyond the average hobby.

3.title: Extreme Excursions
3.plot: Take a tour of the world's most breathtaking journeys, fantastic odysseys and adrenaline-pumping pursuits. Join Forbes in 11 thrilling experiences that are certain to amaze even the most intrepid adventurer.

4.title: First Class Traveler
4.plot: If you like to travel in style, then recline your seat & Dine in Paris on a whim with a charter jet on call, settle into a 2300 square foot Grand Duplex Suite for a grand transatlantic jaunt and go for a drive in one of the most expensive cars ever built.

5.title: Icy Hot Spots
5.plot: Bundle up as we take you to St. Moritz with a private view of the Swiss Matterhorn. Ski the Colorado Rockies & have a nightcap in a five star grotto with some champagne & spend an unforgettable night in the "coolest" hotel on earth.

6.title: Extravagant Meals
6.plot: Enjoy the world's most exclusive mouth watering and expensive meals as Forbes features 11 sumptuous dining destinations with dishes satisfying even the most discerning palates. Pull up a chair as we serve a banquet fit for a sultan.

7.title: High Seas Style
7.plot: Set sail for a dazzling hour of the world's most magnificent mega-yachts, cutting-edge clippers and stylish overseas residences in Forbes Luxe 11: High Seas Style.

8.title: Exclusive Hotels
8.plot: Pack a bag and check-in to the world's most magnificent, pampering, and 5 star deluxe hotels. Forbes features 11 luxuriant places to rest your head. These glorious inns are guaranteed to satisfy those who'll only accept white glove treatment.

9.title: Luxury Steals
9.plot: Travel in high style by keeping more green in your pocket. Sacrifice some unnecessary extras and enjoy a savings by booking the Ocean view suite instead of the Elite Suite. Forbes Luxe 11 shows you how to pinch pennies in the lap of luxury!

10.title: Billionaire Owned Hotels
10.plot: Enjoy a five star feast in a Vegas gem property, set your sights on Asia and frolic in Macau's largest integrated resort. Try-your-luck in picturesque and luxurious St. Moritz. Bring Lady Luck and check in to Forbes Luxe 11: Billionaire Owned Hotels.

imdb.plot outline: From billionaire playgrounds to exclusive hotels, and from extravagant meals to mega toys, The Travel Channel and Forbes Magazine join forces for a dynamic series highlighting the very best in high-end tastes around the world. Let us open the doors on exclusive access to life in the lap of luxury!
imdb.title: Forbes Luxe 11
plot: From billionaire playgrounds to exclusive hotels, and from extravagant meals to mega toys, The Travel Channel and Forbes Magazine join forces for a dynamic series highlighting the very best in high-end tastes around the world. Let us open the doors on exclusive access to life in the lap of luxury!
